00659                                                                 false);
00660                                         } else if (status1.equals("OVER_QUERY_LIMIT")) {
00661                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(
00662                                                                 SecondActivity.this,
00663                                                                 "Places Error",
00664                                                                 "Sorry query limit to google places is reached",
00665                                                                 false);
00666                                         } else if (status1.equals("REQUEST_DENIED")) {
00667                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00668                                                                 "Places Error",
00669                                                                 "Sorry error occured. Request is denied", false);
00670                                         } else if (status1.equals("INVALID_REQUEST")) {
00671                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00672                                                                 "Places Error",
00673                                                                 "Sorry error occured. Invalid Request", false);
00674                                         } else if (status2.equals("ZERO_RESULTS")) {
00675                                                 // Zero results found
00676                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(
00677                                                                 SecondActivity.this,
00678                                                                 "Near Places",
00679                                                                 "Sorry no places found. Try to change the types of places",
00680                                                                 false);
00681                                         } else if (status2.equals("UNKNOWN_ERROR")) {
00682                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00683                                                                 "Places Error", "Sorry unknown error occured.",
00684                                                                 false);
00685                                         } else if (status2.equals("OVER_QUERY_LIMIT")) {
00686                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(
00687                                                                 SecondActivity.this,
00688                                                                 "Places Error",
00689                                                                 "Sorry query limit to google places is reached",
00690                                                                 false);
00691                                         } else if (status2.equals("REQUEST_DENIED")) {
00692                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00693                                                                 "Places Error",
00694                                                                 "Sorry error occured. Request is denied", false);
00695                                         } else if (status2.equals("INVALID_REQUEST")) {
00696                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00697                                                                 "Places Error",
00698                                                                 "Sorry error occured. Invalid Request", false);
00699                                         }
00700 
00701                                         else {
00702                                                 alert.showAlertDialog(SecondActivity.this,
00703                                                                 "Places Error", "Sorry error occured.", false);
00704                                         }
00705                                 }
00706                         });
00707 
00708                 }
00709 
00710         }

00722         private static String distanceVar(int n, int i, int uk) {
00723                 Double[] distance_i = new Double[100];
00724                 DecimalFormat[] myFormat_i = new DecimalFormat[100];
00725                 place_i[n] = hm.get(uk);
00726 
00727                 int befkey = uk;
00728                 distanceVariable_i[n] = null;
00729 
00730                 if (uk > 100) {
00731                         befkey = uk - 100;
00732                         distance_i[n] = DistanceCalculation.distFrom(
00733                                         placesArrayLat2[befkey], placesArrayLng2[befkey],
00734                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lat,
00735                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lng);
00736                         Log.d("filter", "  place distance calc " + distance_i[n].toString());
00737                         myFormat_i[n] = new DecimalFormat("0.0");
00738                         distanceVariable_i[n] = myFormat_i[n].format(distance_i[n]);
00739                         nameArr[nameCount] = place_i[n].name;
00740 
00741                         // error - does not get second place reference here because loops
00742                         // through all to get to it
00743                         // secondPlaceReference[nameCount] = place_i[n].reference;
00744                         Log.d("second", "1 secondPlaceReference[nameCount]  " + nameCount);
00745                         nameCount++;
00746                         // Log.d("distance", "This is place i over 100  " + place_i[n]);
00747 
00748                 } else {
00749                         // this distance variable needs to loop????
00750                         distance_i[n] = DistanceCalculation.distFrom(placesArrayLat[i],
00751                                         placesArrayLng[i], place_i[n].geometry.location.lat,
00752                                         place_i[n].geometry.location.lng);
00753                         Log.d("filter", "  place distance calc " + distance_i[n].toString());
00754                         myFormat_i[n] = new DecimalFormat("0.0");
00755                         distanceVariable_i[n] = myFormat_i[n].format(distance_i[n]);
00756                         nameArr[1] = place_i[n].name;
00757 
00758                         // --------------------------------------------
00759                         // secondPlaceReference[1] = place_i[n].reference;
00760                         Log.d("second", "2 secondPlaceReference[nameCount]  " + nameCount);
00761                         Log.d("distance", "This is place i under 100  " + place_i[n]);
00762                         Log.d("distance", "This is secondPlaceReference[1]  "
00763                                         + secondPlaceReference[1]);
00764                 }
00765                 return distanceVariable_i[n];
00766         }
